title: Like a GP 5000, but Cheaper: Is the Continental Grand Prix TR Your New Favorite Workhorse Road Tire?
content:
The new Grand Prix TR puts the tech of the wildly popular GP 5000 into a more hard-wearing, wallet-friendly package.

Read the full article at Like a GP 5000, but Cheaper: Is the Continental Grand Prix TR Your New Favorite Workhorse Road Tire? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
